docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Privacy's Guarded Prognosis,'' March 1: Any attempt to protect medical privacy must begin with disassociating Social Security numbers from records. The federal government is abetting the snoopers and data assemblers by allowing businesses to demand Social Security numbers for identification.
docs.abstract: Dennis Williams letter responds to March 1 article about privacy of medical records
